h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Watch out for his extended spinning attack with his weapon, and wait for him to get dizzy before launching a counter attack and Immobilizing him to extend his downtime. If he floats into the air, be ready for him to crash his weapon into the ground as he lands.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 3)'.
The content is as follows:
Watch out for his extended spinning attack with his weapon, and wait for him to get dizzy before launching a counter attack and Immobilizing him to extend his downtime. If he floats into the air, be ready for him to crash his weapon into the ground as he lands.
